summary.para: The security binding subtype for specifying the use of SSL/TLS protocol based transport security.
This security binding is supported only with the .
With this security binding, the following security binding properties may be specified:
The base type from which this security binding subtype and all other security binding subtypes derive.
The local certificate credential to be used with this security binding.

Server side: When SSL is used for transport security with , the server certificate must be registered by the application using the httpcfg tool and this field must be set to NULL. In all other cases, the server SSL certificate must be specified using this field.
Client side: If a client certificate is to be used with SSL, it must be specified using this field. If no client certificate is to be used, this field must be set to NULL.
